column4: I just upgraded to 12.04  and now my login cycles.....help please
press CTRL+ALT+F1 and run:   sudo apt-get clean; sudo chown -R $USER:$USER $HOME   then press CTRL+ALT+F7 and login
if you make a new user, is it ok as the new user?
I've got some important data there.....
It actually happened after changed privilages and removed the" login automatically" of other users and mine.....
